name: 蔡瑞吉
objective: 本課程設計重點有三：(1)藉由精選的中級程度教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
schedule:
1-9 weeks chapter 4 nutrition
          chapter 5 from settlement to independence
10-18 weeks chapter 5 from settlement to independence
            chapter 6 a changing nation
scorePolicy:
proficiency tests 30%
final test & quizzes ( 40% + 60% ) 70%
bonus available
materials: unghua Contemporary English Grammar Book one & two
